text: He mominaharu! N'yayama dhrdataka satha kayama rahanevalaharu ra allahako prasannatako lagi samco gavahi dinevala bana. Tyo timro va timro amaâ€“buva va natedaraharuko virud'dha nai kina nahos. Tyo manisa cahe dhani hos athava nirdhana, allaha duvaiko hitaisi cha. Tasartha timile aphnai svarthako pachi lagi n'yayala'i nachadidinu. Yadi timile kura bangya'era gavahi dinchau va saksi dinubata panchinchau bhane (yadarakha) allaha timro sabai kriyakalapa ramrari jandacha
